notesStmt.note: Imperfect at the end. Slightly worm-eaten. Stained.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The second part of Se῾adyah ben Daṿid Adani's homiletico-agadic commentary on Exodus.

collation.p: 11 quires of mostly 10 leaves each. Signed with Hebrew letters and Arabic numerals at the beginning.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite square script of 15th century. Se῾adyah ben Daṿid Adani: probably an autograph of the work; inscribed on folio 102v.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine title: 'Said Al-Adani. On Exodus. Arabic. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2785.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Fischl Hirsch: purchased by the British Library from him on 20 June 1844: inscribed, folio [134v].
